workflows.name: Handle Navbar Visibility
workflows.description: Show/hide navbar based on scroll position. Set isNavbarVisible to true when scrolled down, false when at top.

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

text.en: 50 States. 250 Years. No Kings. Just Citizens. Just U.S.

_ww-text_text.en: 50 States. 250 Years. No Kings. Just Citizens. Just U.S.

text.en: ROAR76 is a non-partisan civic movement dedicated to revitalizing the founding principles of American democracy. We believe in citizen-led governance, constitutional rights, and the power of informed, engaged communities. Our mission is to inspire Americans to reclaim their role as active participants in our republic, just as the founders envisioned.

_ww-text_text.en: ROAR76 is a non-partisan civic movement dedicated to revitalizing the founding principles of American democracy. We believe in citizen-led governance, constitutional rights, and the power of informed, engaged communities. Our mission is to inspire Americans to reclaim their role as active participants in our republic, just as the founders envisioned.

text.en: America was founded on the rejection of monarchy and the embrace of self-governance.

_ww-text_text.en: America was founded on the rejection of monarchy and the embrace of self-governance.

text.en: The flame lit in 1776 still burns. But only if we keep it lit.

_ww-text_text.en:
The flame lit in 1776 still burns.
But only if we keep it lit.

text.en: The power of our republic rests in the hands of engaged, informed citizens who participate actively.

_ww-text_text.en: The power of our republic rests in the hands of engaged, informed citizens who participate actively.

interactions.name: Navigate to Section
interactions.description: Scroll to the target section when nav item is clicked

interactions.name: Scroll to Hero
interactions.description: Scroll to the hero section when logo is clicked

text.en: Join the movement by contacting us at:

_ww-text_text.en: Join the movement by contacting us at:

text.en: The Spirit of '76 was a revolutionary call to action—a declaration that ordinary citizens could govern themselves without kings or tyrants. It was a bold experiment in self-governance that changed the world and created the freest, most prosperous nation in human history.

_ww-text_text.en: The Spirit of '76 was a revolutionary call to action—a declaration that ordinary citizens could govern themselves without kings or tyrants. It was a bold experiment in self-governance that changed the world and created the freest, most prosperous nation in human history.

text.en: Today, as we approach the 250th anniversary of American independence, ROAR76 calls on all citizens to reclaim that revolutionary spirit. Our democracy requires active participation, informed engagement, and a commitment to the constitutional principles that unite us as Americans.

_ww-text_text.en: Today, as we approach the 250th anniversary of American independence, ROAR76 calls on all citizens to reclaim that revolutionary spirit. Our democracy requires active participation, informed engagement, and a commitment to the constitutional principles that unite us as Americans.

text.en: The most powerful office in America is citizen.

_ww-text_text.en: The most powerful office in America is citizen.

interactions.name: Scroll to Join Section
interactions.description: Scroll to the join section when CTA button is clicked

interactions.name: Send Email
interactions.description: Open email client with pre-filled address

text.en: United in our diversity, we are stronger when we work together toward our shared American ideals.

_ww-text_text.en:
United in our diversity, U.S. is US.
Stronger together with our shared American ideals.

interactions.name: Navigate and Close Menu
interactions.description: Navigate to section and close the mobile menu
